title: Bio-Commons Camp
synopsis: First day at the bio-commons camp at the Rural Hub in Italy.

title: Bio-Strike
synopsis: The overuse of available antibiotics and subsequent [[evolutionary pressure]] has led to the development of multi-resistant bacteria. In the Bio-Strike initiative, citizen around the globe collaborate to by raise awareness on the issue and find new antibiotics and overcome the antibiotics crisis.

title: BioCommons
synopsis: The biocommons is a place to safeguard and steward the legacy of millions of years of biological evolution. The biocommons is a place to archive, research, and share information about biology, genetics and ecology.

title: evolutionary pressure
synopsis: An overuse of the available antibiotics and subsequent evolutionary pressure led to the development of multi-resistant bacteria. By now, the situation is becoming urgent, as very few effective drugs are left to treat infections. Antibiotic resistance development is a natural process. Bacteria are under selective pressure and evolve mechanisms to avoid the antimicrobial effects of the antibiotics.
